title: Hour 2 - Pausing the Kevin Durant Drama
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Pausing the Kevin Durant Drama
description:
Dan Patrick discusses what role athletes play as leaders both inside and outside their organizations. FS1's Nick Wright joins the show to talk the latest on Kevin Durant, Kyrie Irving, and the Brooklyn Nets. Plus, is Aaron Donald headed for the same punishment that Myles Garrett faced?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
